name: The Hidden Ones
description: Mysterious shapeshifters and legendary creatures from folklore and cryptozoology. The Hidden Ones have watched humanity from the shadows for millennia, inspiring terror and wonder through fleeting glimpses and unexplained encounters.
shortDescription: Shapeshifting cryptids - transformation, fear tactics, ambush predators, diverse creatures

lore.origin: Since the dawn of human consciousness, strange beings have lurked at the edge of firelight. They are the source of every legend, every whispered tale, every unexplained sighting. Now, as the veil between worlds thins, the Hidden Ones emerge to claim what was always theirs.
lore.motivation: To reclaim the wild places stolen by civilization and restore the primal fear that once kept humanity in check
lore.culture: A loose coalition of diverse cryptids united by their shared existence in the shadows. Each creature type maintains its own traditions, but all acknowledge the ancient pacts that bind them together.

strengths.name: Shapeshifting
strengths.description: Many units can transform between multiple forms, each with unique abilities

strengths.name: Terror Tactics
strengths.description: Fear effects cause enemies to flee and fight less effectively

strengths.name: Ambush Mastery
strengths.description: Units deal bonus damage when attacking from stealth or concealment

strengths.name: Cryptid Diversity
strengths.description: Extremely varied unit types with unique abilities and roles

strengths.name: Mimicry
strengths.description: Certain units can disguise as enemy units or copy their abilities

strengths.name: Nocturnal Power
strengths.description: Most units gain bonuses during night time

weaknesses.name: Expensive Transformations
weaknesses.description: Shapeshifting costs resources and has cooldowns

weaknesses.name: Weak in Open Combat
weaknesses.description: Many units are weaker in sustained direct combat

weaknesses.name: Light Sensitivity
weaknesses.description: Some units are weakened in bright light or by holy effects

weaknesses.name: Fear Dependency
weaknesses.description: Effectiveness diminishes against fearless or morale-immune enemies

weaknesses.name: Coordination Difficulty
weaknesses.description: Diverse unit types require more micromanagement

transformationSystem.description: Units with shapeshifting can transform between different forms with unique abilities

fearSystem.description: Terror effects stack on enemies, causing panic at high levels

ambushSystem.description: Units deal bonus damage when attacking from stealth or after being concealed

mimicrySystem.description: Certain units can copy the appearance or abilities of enemy units

essenceSystem.description: Essence is gathered from fear and death, powering cryptid abilities

essence.name: Essence
essence.description: Gathered from causing fear and death, powers transformations and abilities

dread.name: Dread
dread.description: Accumulated terror used for powerful rituals and summons
